DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate incidence hypotension base discontinuation order norepinephrine vasopressin patient receive concomitant norepinephrine vasopressin infusion treatment septic shock .
DOC.detailed_description: There little data regard discontinuation vasopressor patient septic shock . Therefore , investigator intend evaluate incidence hypotension base discontinuation order norepinephrine vasopressin patient receive concomitant norepinephrine vasopressin infusion treatment septic shock .
